attributes.action: The signatories demand the UK state adopt a written (codified) constitution.
attributes.additional_details: As the UK state moves into a diffetent relationship with its citizens and global partners, it is imperative we have an accessible basic roadmap and set of ideals that will guide all in the times to come.
attributes.background: The UK is one of 4 major democratic countries that doesn't have a codified constitution to clarify to all the limits of government and its agencies, and to protect the rights and sovereignty of the individual British citizen. We demand a constitutional court to adjudicate constitutional matters.
